channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on rraks

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Rakshit Ramesh, a vagabond by technology, a stoic by philosophy and most of all a cripple by procrastination. This blog is my attempt at recording my influenced thoughts as I am inextricably drawn through the web of intermingling causality.
